card.name: Miele, Vizier of Lightning
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

card.name: Spiral Gate
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Magris, Vizier of Magnetism
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Lost Soul
card.text: ■ Your opponent discards all cards from his hand.

card.name: Aqua Surfer
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Energy Stream
card.text: ■ Draw 2 cards.

card.name: Dimension Splitter
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return all creatures that have Dragon in their race from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Necrodragon Giland
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When this creature battles, destroy it after the battle.

card.name: Jil Warka, Time Guardian
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When this creature is destroyed, choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap them.

card.name: Bat Doctor, Shadow of Undeath
card.text: ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may return another creature from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Pala Olesis, Morning Guardian
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ During your opponent's turn, each of your other creatures gets +2000 power. ■ This creature can't attack players.

card.name: Time Tripper, Shadow of Stagnation
card.text: ■ Whenever your opponent's puts a card into their mana zone, tap it.

card.name: Western Barrel, Shadow of Riots
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards a card from their hand.

card.name: Heaven's Gate
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put up to 2 non-evolution light creatures that have "blocker" from your hand to the battle zone.

card.name: Super Spark
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone.

card.name: Bloody Shadow, Mystic Light Death Knight
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Gravity Zero ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When this creature wins a battle, destroy it.

card.name: Dark Soul Creation
card.text: ■ You may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, draw 3 cards.

card.name: Black Lucifer, Sorcerer of Darkness
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, put the top 5 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ This creature gets +1000 power for each Demon Command in your graveyard. ■ Double Breaker ■ When this creature would be destroyed, you may return a Demon Command evolution creature from your graveyard to your hand instead.

card.name: Secret Clocktower
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Put a card into your hand, put one on the bottom of your deck, and the other on top of your deck.

card.name: Qurian
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Mil Armor, Mecha King Vizier
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Blocker ■ Your spells may each cost 1 less to cast. They can't cost less than 1.

card.name: Diamond Aven, Awakening Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, ignore any effects that prevent your other creatures from attacking your opponent this turn. ''(For example, ignore summoning sickness and card effects that say "This creature can't attack" or "This creature can't attack players". Your creatures can't attack creatures this way.)''

card.name: Dark Lupia
card.text: ■ Whenever one of your Dragons are destroyed, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Aqua Burster
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy this creature. If you do, choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Death Circle, the Explosive Shadow
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy this creature. If you do, your opponent chooses one of their untapped creatures and destroys it.

card.name: Aqua Super Emeral
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may add a card from your hand to your shields face down. If you do, choose one of your shields and put it into your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.

card.name: Kuragen
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take an evolution creature from it and show it to your opponent. Then shuffle your deck and put the chosen card on top of your deck.

card.name: Maxwell Z, the Super-Electric
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your creatures that has Cyber in its race. ■ Soulshift ■ Players can't cast spells that share a civilization with a spell in their graveyard. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Time Changer, Space-Time Engineer
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your evolution creatures in the battle zone. If you do, search your deck and you may take up to 2 creatures from your deck, show them to your opponent, and put them under the chosen evolution creature. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Roxio, Electro-Fuuma
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Then put them on top of your deck in any order.

card.name: Ulphas, White Knight Lord of Spirits
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Evolution—Put on one of your creatures that has "Blocker". ■ Soulshift ■ End Step ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Reesa, Infinity Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, you may untap this creature after the battle.

card.name: Gunes Valkyrie, Holy Vizier
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Evolution—Put on one of your creatures that has "Blocker". ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

card.name: Lunar Kuroro
card.text: ■ Each creature in the battle zone gets "slayer". ''(Whenever a creature that has "Slayer" battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.)'' ■ Whenever your Dragons attack, you may return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Corteo, Spirit Knight
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each of your creatures in the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

card.name: Necrodragon Czar Gandhi
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return a creature that has power 6000 or more from your graveyard to your hand. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Phal Reeze, Apocalyptic Sage
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return a spell from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Emperor Maribel
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your creatures that has Cyber in its race or one of your Origins. ■ Meteorburn—Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Cherenko
card.text: ■ Shield Plus ■ When you use this creature's "Shield Plus" ability, look at that shield and put a card from that stack on the top of your deck.

card.name: Bega, Vizier of Shadow
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. Then discard a card at random from your opponent's hand.

card.name: Memories of the Planetary Dragon
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Each of your shield cards put into your hand get "shield trigger" until the End Step

card.name: Necrodragon Heavy Kerberos
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever one of your creatures with Dragon in its race is destroyed, you may draw 2 cards.

card.name: Gabriel XENOM, the Reaper King
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Demon Commands or Angel Commands. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. If you do, destroy one of your opponent's creatures and return a Demon Command or Angel Command from your graveyard to your hand. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Aqua Sonicwave
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose another creature in the battle zone that has power 4000 or less and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Death Gate, Gate of Hell
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures. You may put a non-evolution creature that costs less than the destroyed creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

card.name: Gaga Petrova, Light Spirit
card.text: ■ Each of your other Aliens in the battle zone gets +4000 power.

card.name: Vice Kaiser Zeta, the Vengeance
card.text: ■ For each spell in your opponent's graveyard, this creature costs 1 less to summon. It can't cost less than 1. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent reveals their hand and discards all spells from it. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Bone Dance Charger
card.text: ■ Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ Charger

card.name: Codename Build Leone
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of your opponent's non-evolution creatures in the battle zone and add it to its owner's shields face down. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Necrodragon Abayo Shabayo
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it.

card.name: Codename Dread Blood
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ At the Step#Step 2 (Draw)
